Skill.Name: Guttling Hook
Skill.Lore: The Devourer launches his Guttling Hook at a target unit or location. The first targetable unit that touches the hook will be dragged back to the Devourer.

Skill.Name: Decay
Skill.Lore: The Devourer allows himself to decay, draining his Health over time and releasing poisonous gasses that both damage and slow nearby enemy units.

Skill.Name: Cadaver Armor
Skill.Lore: This grotesque armor increases the Devourer's Magic Armor and permanently adds {0.9,1.2,1.5,1.8} strength for each hero kill and {0.03,0.06,0.09,0.12} strength for each creep kill he makes.

Skill.Name: Devour
Skill.Lore: The Devourer grabs a target enemy and feasts on their flesh, dealing massive damage for every second he feeds.
